state_analysis: The database 'production_db' doesn't exist when accessed as the postgres user. It seems the database was created as root user but postgres user can't see it. I need to recreate the database properly using the postgres user.
explanation: I'll create the database and tables using the postgres system user, then import the cleaned data.

commands.keystrokes: su - postgres -c "psql -d production_db -c \"COPY users(user_id, username, email, created_at, status) FROM '/backup/clean_users.csv' WITH (FORMAT csv, HEADER true);\""
